amendment.description: To develop and maintain an integrated system of ocean and coastal observations for the Nation's coasts, oceans and Great Lakes, improve warnings of tsunamis and other natural hazards, improve management of coastal and marine resources, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1102 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1102 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Stevens. (consideration: CR S7936) To develop and maintain an integrated system of ocean and coastal observations for the Nation's coasts, oceans and Great Lakes, improve warnings of tsunamis and other natural hazards, improve management of coastal and marine resources, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1102 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Stevens.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1102 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
